archimate:Capability.name: Product - Service Management
archimate:Capability.documentation: Ability to conceptualize, design, develop, bundle, source, maintain, and retire a named combination of goods and doing-of-work-for-others that can be offered to constituents, in whole or in part, to satisfy a constituent’s needs.

properties.value: Ability to conceptualize, design, develop, bundle, source, maintain, and retire a named combination of goods and doing-of-work-for-others that can be offered to constituents, in whole or in part, to satisfy a constituent’s needs.
